title: Angular documentation style guide
contents:
mode_edit

Angular 文件風格指南link

Angular documentation style guidelink

本風格指南涵蓋了在 angular.io 上編寫 Angular 文件的標準。這些標準確保了寫作風格、Markdown 約定和程式碼片段的一致性。

This style guide covers the standards for writing Angular documentation on angular.io. These standards ensure consistency in writing style, Markdown conventions, and code snippets.

前提條件link

Prerequisiteslink

在為 Angular 文件做貢獻之前，如果你熟悉以下內容，會很有幫助：

Before contributing to the Angular documentation, it is helpful if you are familiar with the following:

主題Subjects 詳細資訊Details
git 有關介紹，參閱 GitHub 的Git 手冊For an introduction, see GitHub's Git Handbook
GitHub 有關介紹，參閱 GitHub 的Hello WorldFor an introduction, see GitHub's Hello World
降價Markdown 參閱 GitHub 的精通 MarkdownSee GitHub's Mastering Markdown
Angular 編碼風格Angular coding style 參閱Angular 風格指南See the Angular Style Guide
谷歌的寫作風格Google writing style Google 開發者文件風格指南是本 Angular 文件風格指南所基於的綜合資源The Google Developer Documentation Style Guide is a comprehensive resource that this Angular documentation style guide builds upon

Angular 文件的種類link

Kinds of Angular documentationlink

Angular 文件的類別包括：

The categories of Angular documentation include:

Angular 文件類別Angular documentation categories 詳細資訊Details
指南Guides angular.io 文件部分中的大部分內容。指南會引導讀者一步步完成任務以展示概念，並且通常伴隨著一個工作範例。其中包括入門、英雄之旅以及有關Forms 、依賴注入和HttpClient的頁面。社群的貢獻成員和 Angular 團隊成員在Markdown中維護本文件。Much of what's in the documentation section of angular.io. Guides walk the reader step-by-step through tasks to demonstrate concepts and are often accompanied by a working example. These include Getting Started, Tour of Heroes, and pages about Forms, Dependency Injection, and HttpClient. Contributing members of the community and Angular team members maintain this documentation in Markdown.
API 文件API documentation Angular 應用程式程式設計介面或 API的參考文件。這些比指南更簡潔，可作為 Angular 特性的參考。它們對於已經熟悉 Angular 概念的人特別有幫助。angular.io基礎設施從原始碼和貢獻者編輯的註釋產生這些文件。Reference documents for the Angular Application Programming Interface, or API. These are more succinct than guides and serve as a reference for Angular features. They are especially helpful for people already acquainted with Angular concepts. The angular.io infrastructure generates these documents from source code and comments that contributors edit.
CLI 文件CLI documentation angular.io基礎設施從 CLI 源程式碼產生器這些文件。The angular.io infrastructure generates these documents from CLI source code.

Markdown 和 HTMLlink

Markdown and HTMLlink

雖然 Angular 指南是Markdown檔案，但指南中的某些部分使用了 HTML。

While the Angular guides are Markdown files, there are some sections within the guides that use HTML.

要在 Angular 指南中啟用 HTML，請始終在每個開啟和關閉 HTML 標籤之後使用空行。

To enable HTML in an Angular guide, always follow every opening and closing HTML tag with a blank line.

請注意以下範例中開啟 <div> 之後所需的空行：

Notice the required blank line after the opening <div> in the following example:

<div class="alert is-helpful"> **Always** follow every opening and closing HTML tag with *a blank line*. </div>

習慣上，但不要求在結束 HTML 標籤之前有一個空行。

It is customary but not required to precede the closing HTML tag with a blank line as well.

標題link

Titlelink

每個指南文件都必須有一個標題，並且它應該出現在頁面的頂部。

Every guide document must have a title, and it should appear at the top of the page.

標題以 Markdown 雜湊（#）字元開頭，在瀏覽器中渲染為 <h1>。

Begin the title with the Markdown hash (#) character, which renders as an <h1> in the browser.

# Angular documentation style guide
標題指導Title guidance 詳細資訊Details
一個文件只能有一個 <h1>A document can have only one <h1> 標題文字應該是Sentence case，這意味著第一個單詞是大寫的，所有其他單詞都是小寫的。始終大寫的技術術語，比如“Angular”，是個例外。# Angular 中的棄用策略Title text should be in Sentence case, which means the first word is capitalized and all other words are lower case. Technical terms that are always capitalized, like "Angular", are the exception. # Deprecation policy in Angular
始終在標題後面至少有一個空行Always follow the title with at least one blank line 左側導航中的相應文字在Title Case中，這意味著你可以用大寫字母來開頭第一個單詞和所有主要單詞。對“in”、“of”和“the”等次要詞使用小寫字母。你還可以縮短導航標題以適合列。The corresponding text in the left nav is in Title Case, which means that you use capital letters to start the first words and all principal words. Use lower case letters for secondary words such as "in", "of", and "the". You can also shorten the nav title to fit in the column.

部分link

Sectionslink

典型的文件有部分。

A typical document has sections.

所有部分標題都用Sentence case，這意味著第一個單詞是大寫的，所有其他單詞都是小寫的。

All section headings are in Sentence case, which means the first word is capitalized and all other words are lower case.

始終遵循至少有一個空行的部分標題。

Always follow a section heading with at least one blank line.

主要部分標題link

Main section headinglink

通常有一個或多個主要部分，可以進一步分為次要部分。

There are usually one or more main sections that may be further divided into secondary sections.

以 Markdown ## 字元開頭的主要部分標題，在瀏覽器中渲染為 <h2>。

Begin a main section heading with the Markdown ## characters, which renders as an <h2> in the browser.

在主要部分標題之後使用空行，然後是該標題的內容，如以下範例所示：

Follow main section headings with a blank line and then the content for that heading as in the following example:

## Main section heading Content after a blank line.

次要部分標題link

Secondary section headinglink

次要部分標題與主標題相關，在文字上屬於該主標題的範圍。

A secondary section heading is related to a main heading and falls textually within the bounds of that main heading.

以 Markdown ### 字元開頭的輔助標題，在瀏覽器中渲染為 <h3>。

Begin a secondary heading with the Markdown ### characters, which renders as an <h3> in the browser.

在次標題後面加一個空行，然後是該標題的內容，如以下範例所示：

Follow a secondary heading by a blank line and then the content for that heading as in the following example:

### Secondary section heading Content after a blank line.

其他節標題link

Additional section headingslink

雖然你可以用其他部分標題，但目錄（TOC）產生器僅在頁面右側的 TOC 中顯示 <h2> 和 <h3> 標題。

While you can use additional section headings, the Table-of-contents (TOC) generator only shows <h2> and <h3> headings in the TOC on the right of the page.

#### The TOC won't display this Content after a blank line.

目錄link

Table of contentslink

大多數頁面會顯示目錄或 TOC。當畫面很寬時，TOC 會出現在右側面板中。縮小時，TOC 會出現在頁面頂部附近的可摺疊區域。

Most pages display a table of contents or TOC. The TOC appears in the right panel when the viewport is wide. When narrow, the TOC appears in a collapsible region near the top of the page.

你無需手動建立自己的 TOC，因為 TOC 產生器會自動從頁面的 <h2> 和 <h3> 標頭建立一個。

You don't need to create your own TOC by hand because the TOC generator creates one automatically from the page's <h2> and <h3> headers.

要從 TOC 中排除標題，請使用名為 'no-toc' 的類將標題建立為 <h2> 或 <h3> 元素。

To exclude a heading from the TOC, create the heading as an <h2> or <h3> element with a class called 'no-toc'.

<h3 class="no-toc"> This heading is not displayed in the TOC </h3>

你可以透過使用 <h1> 標籤和 no-toc 類編寫標題來關閉整個頁面的 TOC 產生。

You can turn off TOC generation for the entire page by writing the title with an <h1> tag and the no-toc class.

<h1 class="no-toc"> A guide without a TOC </h1>

導航link

Navigationlink

要在螢幕的頂部、左側和底部產生導航連結，請使用 JSON 配置檔案 content/navigation.json。

To generate the navigation links at the top, left, and bottom of the screen, use the JSON configuration file, content/navigation.json.

如果你有一個會導致導航更改的想法，請首先提交問題，以便 Angular 團隊和社群可以討論此更改。

If you have an idea that would result in navigation changes, file an issue first so that the Angular team and community can discuss the change.

對於新的指南頁面，請編輯 navigation.json 中的 SideNav 節點。SideNav 節點是一個導航節點陣列。每個節點要麼是單個文件的條目節點，要麼是帶有子節點的標頭節點。

For a new guide page, edit the SideNav node in navigation.json. The SideNav node is an array of navigation nodes. Each node is either an item node for a single document or a header node with child nodes.

查詢頁面的標頭。比如，描述 Angular 特性的指南頁面可能是 Fundamentals 標頭的子項。

Find the header for your page. For example, a guide page that describes an Angular feature is probably a child of the Fundamentals header.

{ "title": "Fundamentals", "tooltip": "The fundamentals of Angular", "children": [ … ] }

標頭節點子項可以是 item 節點或另一個標頭節點。如果你的指南頁面屬於子標題下，請在 JSON 中查詢該子標題。

A header node child can be an item node or another header node. If your guide page belongs under a sub-header, find that sub-header in the JSON.

為你的指南頁面新增一個 item 節點作為適當的標頭節點的子項，如以下範例所示：

Add an item node for your guide page as a child of the appropriate header node as in the following example:

{ "url": "guide/docs-style-guide", "title": "Doc authors style guide", "tooltip": "Style guide for documentation authors.", },

導航節點具有以下屬性：

A navigation node has the following properties:

屬性Properties 詳細資訊Details
url 指南頁面的 URL，僅是 item 節點。The URL of the guide page, which is an item node only.
title 側面導航中顯示的文字。The text displayed in the side nav.
tooltip 當閱讀器將滑鼠懸停在導航連結上時出現的文字。Text that appears when the reader hovers over the navigation link.
children 子節點陣列，僅是標頭節點。An array of child nodes, which is a header node only.
hidden 如果這是不應該在導航面板中顯示的指南頁面，則已定義並設定為 true。Defined and set true if this is a guide page that should not be displayed in the navigation panel.

不要透過指定標頭節點的 url 屬性來建立同時作為標頭和條目節點的節點。

Do not create a node that is both a header and an item node by specifying the url property of a header node.

程式碼片段link

Code snippetslink

Angular.io有一個自訂框架，使作者能夠直接包含來自工作範例應用程式的程式碼片段，這些程式碼片段會作為文件建構的一部分自動測試。

Angular.io has a custom framework that enables authors to include code snippets directly from working example applications that are automatically tested as part of documentation builds.

除了工作程式碼片段之外，範例程式碼還可以包括終端命令、TypeScript 或 HTML 的片段或整個程式碼檔案。

In addition to working code snippets, example code can include terminal commands, a fragment of TypeScript or HTML, or an entire code file.

無論來源是什麼，文件檢視器都會將它們渲染為程式碼片段，可以單獨使用code-example元件，也可以作為帶有code-tabs元件的選項卡式集合。

Whatever the source, the document viewer renders them as code snippets, either individually with the code-example component or as a tabbed collection with the code-tabs component.

何時使用程式碼字型link

When to use code fontlink

你可以用 Markdown 反引號語法顯示最小的內聯程式碼段。在句子中參考程式碼或檔名時，在術語的任一側使用單個反引號。以下是一些例子：

You can display a minimal, inline code snippet with the Markdown backtick syntax. Use a single backtick on either side of a term when referring to code or the name of a file in a sentence. The following are some examples:

  • 在 app.component.ts 中，新增 logger() 方法。

    In the app.component.ts, add a logger() method.

  • name 屬性是 Sally。

    The name property is Sally.

  • 將元件類別名稱新增到 declarations 陣列。

    Add the component class name to the declarations array.

Markdown 如下：

The Markdown is as follows:

* In the `app.component.ts`, add a `logger()` method. * The <code class="no-auto-link">item</code> property is `true`. * Add the component class name to the `declarations` array.

程式碼片段中的自動連結link

Auto-linking in code snippetslink

在某些情況下，當你在某個術語周圍應用反引號時，它可能會自動連結到 API 文件。如果你不打算將該術語作為連結，請使用以下語法：

In certain cases, when you apply backticks around a term, it may auto-link to the API documentation. If you do not intend the term to be a link, use the following syntax:

The <code class="no-auto-link">item</code> property is `true`.

硬編碼的片段link

Hard-coded snippetslink

理想情況下，你應該從工作範例程式碼中獲取程式碼片段，儘管有時需要內聯程式碼段。

Ideally, you should source code snippets from working sample code, though there are times when an inline snippet is necessary.

對於終端輸入和輸出，將內容放在 <code-example> 標籤之間，並將語言屬性設定為 sh，如此範例所示：

For terminal input and output, place the content between <code-example> tags and set the language attribute to sh as in this example:

npm start <code-example language="shell"> npm start </code-example>

像這樣的內聯硬編碼片段不可測試，因此本質上不可靠。此範例屬於一小組預先批准的內聯程式碼段，其中包括命令 shell 中的使用者輸入或某些處理序的輸出。

Inline, hard-coded snippets like this one are not testable and, therefore, intrinsically unreliable. This example belongs to the small set of pre-approved, inline snippets that includes user input in a command shell or the output of some process.

在所有其他情況下，程式碼片段應該從經過測試的程式碼範例自動產生。

In all other cases, code snippets should be generated automatically from tested code samples.

對於假設的範例，比如 JSON 檔案中的配置選項插圖，請使用帶有 header 屬性的 <code-example> 標籤來標識上下文。

For hypothetical examples such as illustrations of configuration options in a JSON file, use the <code-example> tag with the header attribute to identify the context.

可編譯的範例應用程式link

Compilable example appslink

Angular 文件的設計目標之一是指南頁面程式碼段是可工作程式碼的範例。

One of the Angular documentation design goals is that guide page code snippets be examples of working code.

作者透過直接顯示來自工作範例應用程式的、專門為這些指南頁面編寫的程式碼片段來實現這一目標。

Authors meet this goal by displaying code snippets directly from working sample applications, written specifically for these guide pages.

在 angular/angular 儲存庫的 content/examples 目錄的子資料夾中查詢範例應用程式。範例資料夾名稱通常與其支援的指南頁面相同。

Find sample applications in sub-folders of the content/examples directory of the angular/angular repository. An example folder name is often the same as the guide page it supports.

指南頁面可能沒有自己的範例程式碼。相反，它可能會參考屬於另一個頁面的範例。

A guide page might not have its own sample code. It might refer instead to a sample belonging to another page.

Angular CI 過程為每個 Angular PR 執行所有端到端測試。在每個新版本的範例和每個新版本的 Angular 之後，Angular 都會重新測試這些範例。

The Angular CI process runs all end-to-end tests for every Angular PR. Angular re-tests the samples after every new version of a sample and every new version of Angular.

如果可能，指南頁面上的每個程式碼片段都應該來自程式碼範例檔案。你透過配置 <code-example> 屬性來告訴 Angular 文件引擎要顯示哪個程式碼檔案（或程式碼檔案的片段）。

When possible, every snippet of code on a guide page should be derived from a code sample file. You tell the Angular documentation engine which code file —or fragment of a code file— to display by configuring <code-example> attributes.

顯示整個程式碼檔案link

Displaying an entire code filelink

你當前正在閱讀的本 Angular 文件風格指南有自己的範例應用程式，位於 content/examples/docs-style-guide 資料夾中。

This Angular documentation style guide that you are currently reading has its own example application, located in the content/examples/docs-style-guide folder.

以下 <code-example> 顯示範例的 app.module.ts：

The following <code-example> displays the sample's app.module.ts:

import { NgModule } from '@angular/core'; import { BrowserModule } from '@angular/platform-browser'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { AppComponent } from './app.component'; @NgModule({ imports: [ BrowserModule, FormsModule ], declarations: [ AppComponent ], bootstrap: [ AppComponent ] }) export class AppModule { }

以下標註會產生該程式碼段：

The following markup produces that snippet:

<code-example path="docs-style-guide/src/app/app.module.ts" header="src/app/app.module.ts"></code-example>

path 屬性在 content/examples 中的範例應用程式資料夾位置標識程式碼段的原始檔。在此範例中，該路徑是 docs-style-guide/src/app/app.module.ts。

The path attribute identifies the snippet's source file at the example application folder's location within content/examples. In this example, that path is docs-style-guide/src/app/app.module.ts.

標頭告訴讀者在哪裡可以找到檔案。按照約定，將 header 屬性設定為範例應用程式根資料夾中的檔案位置。

The header tells the reader where to find the file. Following convention, set the header attribute to the file's location within the example application's root folder.

除非另行說明，否則本頁面中的所有程式碼片段都來自位於 content/examples/docs-style-guide 目錄中的範例原始碼。

Unless otherwise commented, all code snippets in this page are from sample source code located in the content/examples/docs-style-guide directory.

顯示程式碼檔案的一部分link

Displaying part of a code filelink

要在範例程式碼檔案中包含程式碼片段，而不是整個檔案，請使用 <code-example> region 屬性。以下範例側重於 AppModule 類及其 @NgModule() 元資料：

To include a snippet of code within a sample code file, rather than the entire file, use the <code-example> region attribute. The following example focuses on the AppModule class and its @NgModule() metadata:

@NgModule({ imports: [ BrowserModule, FormsModule ], declarations: [ AppComponent ], bootstrap: [ AppComponent ] }) export class AppModule { }

要渲染上面的範例，Markdown 檔案中的 HTML 如下：

To render the above example, the HTML in the Markdown file is as follows:

<code-example path="docs-style-guide/src/app/app.module.ts" header="src/app/app.module.ts" region="class"></code-example>

path 指向檔案，就像渲染整個檔案的範例一樣。region 屬性指定原始檔的一部分，由開啟的 #docregion 和關閉的 #enddocregion。

The path points to the file, just as in examples that render the entire file. The region attribute specifies a portion of the source file delineated by an opening #docregion and a closing #enddocregion.

你可以在下面的原始檔中看到 #docregion class。請注意 content/examples/docs-style-guide/src/app/app.module.ts 中名為 class 的註釋行 #docregion 和 #enddocregion。

You can see the class #docregion in the source file below. Notice the commented lines #docregion and #enddocregion in content/examples/docs-style-guide/src/app/app.module.ts with the name class.

import { NgModule } from '@angular/core'; import { BrowserModule } from '@angular/platform-browser'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { AppComponent } from './app.component'; // #docregion class @NgModule({ imports: [ BrowserModule, FormsModule ], declarations: [ AppComponent ], bootstrap: [ AppComponent ] }) export class AppModule { } // #enddocregion class

開頭和結尾的 #docregion 它們之間的任何程式碼行指定為包含在程式碼段中。這就是為什麼 #docregion class 之外的匯入陳述式不在程式碼片段中的原因。

The opening and ending #docregion lines designate any lines of code between them as being included in the code snippet. This is why the import statements outside of the class #docregion are not in the code snippet.

有關如何準備在指南中使用的範例應用程式檔案的更多資訊，參閱原始碼標註。

For more information on how to prepare example application files for use in guides, see Source code markup.

程式碼段選項link

Code snippet optionslink

使用以下屬性指定 <code-example> 輸出：

Specify the <code-example> output with the following attributes:

屬性Attributes 詳細資訊Details
path content/examples 資料夾中檔案的路徑。The path to the file in the content/examples folder.
header 程式碼列表的標頭。這是程式碼段的標題，可以包含路徑和額外的資訊，比如程式碼段是否是摘錄。The header of the code listing. This is the title of the code snippet and can include the path and extra information such as whether the snippet is an excerpt.
region 顯示具有該區域名稱的原始檔片段；區域由原始檔中的 #docregion 標註標識。參閱顯示程式碼段。Displays the source file fragment with that region name; regions are identified by #docregion markup in the source file. See Displaying a code snippet.
linenums 值可以是 true 、 false 或 number。預設值為 false，這意味著瀏覽器不顯示行號。number 選項從給定值開始行號。比如，linenums=4 將起始行號設定為 4。Value may be true, false, or a number. The default is false, which means that the browser displays no line numbers. The number option starts line numbering at the given value. For example, linenums=4 sets the starting line number to 4.
class 程式碼片段可以用 CSS 類 no-box 和 avoid 來設定樣式。Code snippets can be styled with the CSS classes no-box and avoid.
hideCopy 隱藏複製按鈕。Hides the copy button.
language 原始碼語言，比如 javascript 、 html 、 css 、 typescript 、 json 或 shell。此屬性僅適用於硬編碼範例。The source code language such as javascript, html, css, typescript, json, or shell. This attribute only applies to hard-coded examples.

顯示錯誤程式碼link

Displaying bad codelink

有時，你希望顯示一個不太理想的程式碼或設計的範例，比如Angular風格指南中的 exclude 範例。因為讀者有可能在自己的應用程式中複製並貼上劣質程式碼的範例，因此請儘量減少對此類程式碼的使用。

Occasionally, you want to display an example of less than ideal code or design, such as with avoid examples in the Angular Style Guide. Because it is possible for readers to copy and paste examples of inferior code in their own applications, try to minimize use of such code.

在你需要不可接受的範例的情況下，你可以將 class 設定為 avoid 或在原始檔的檔名中包含單詞 avoid。透過將 avoid 一詞放在檔名或路徑中，文件產生器會自動將 avoid 類新增到 <code-example>。這些選項中的任何一個都以鮮紅色框住程式碼片段，以吸引讀者的注意力。

In cases where you need unacceptable examples, you can set the class to avoid or have the word avoid in the filename of the source file. By putting the word avoid in the filename or path, the documentation generator automatically adds the avoid class to the <code-example>. Either of these options frames the code snippet in bright red to grab the reader's attention.

這是Angular 風格指南中一個“ avoid ”範例的標註，該範例在路徑名中使用了 Avoid 單詞：

Here's the markup for an "avoid" example in the Angular Style Guide that uses the word avoid in the path name:

<code-example header="app/heroes/hero-button/hero-button.component.ts" path="styleguide/src/05-03/app/heroes/shared/hero-button/hero-button.component.avoid.ts" region="example"></code-example>

檔名中包含“avoid”一詞會導致瀏覽器渲染帶有紅色標頭和邊框的程式碼片段：

Having the word "avoid" in the file name causes the browser to render the code snippet with a red header and border:

/* avoid */ @Component({ selector: '[tohHeroButton]', templateUrl: './hero-button.component.html' }) export class HeroButtonComponent {}

或者，HTML 可以包含 avoid 類，如下所示：

Alternatively, the HTML could include the avoid class as in the following:

<code-example class="avoid" header="docs-style-guide/src/app/not-great.component.ts" path="docs-style-guide/src/app/not-great.component.ts" region="not-great"></code-example>

顯式應用類 avoid 會導致紅色標題和紅色邊框的相同結果：

Explicitly applying the class avoid causes the same result of a red header and red border:

export class NotGreatComponent { buggyFunction() { // things could be better here... } }

程式碼選項卡link

Code Tabslink

程式碼選項卡顯示程式碼的方式與 code-examples 非常相似，並且具有在選項卡式介面中顯示多個程式碼範例的額外優勢。每個選項卡都使用 code-pane 顯示程式碼。

Code tabs display code much like code-examples with the added advantage of displaying multiple code samples within a tabbed interface. Each tab displays code using a code-pane.

code-tabs 屬性link

code-tabs attributeslink

  • linenums：值可以是 true 、 false 或表示起始行號的數字。預設值為 false。

    linenums: The value can be true, false, or a number indicating the starting line number. The default is false.

code-pane 屬性link

code-pane attributeslink

屬性Attributes 詳細資訊Details
path content/examples 資料夾中的檔案A file in the content/examples folder
header 選項卡標題中顯示的內容What displays in the header of a tab
linenums 覆蓋此特定窗格的 code-tabs 級別的 linenums 屬性。該值可以是 true 、 false 或指示起始行號的數字。預設值為 false。Overrides the linenums property at the code-tabs level for this particular pane. The value can be true, false, or a number indicating the starting line number. The default is false.

以下範例顯示多個程式碼選項卡，每個都有自己的標頭。它示範了在 <code-tabs> 和 <code-pane> 中顯示行號。

The following example displays multiple code tabs, each with its own header. It demonstrates showing line numbers in <code-tabs> and <code-pane>.

<h1>{{title}}</h1> <h2>My Heroes</h2> <ul class="heroes"> <li *ngFor="let hero of heroes"> <button [class.selected]="hero === selectedHero" type="button" (click)="onSelect(hero)"> <span class="badge">{{hero.id}}</span> <span class="name">{{hero.name}}</span> </button> </li> </ul> <div *ngIf="selectedHero"> <h2>{{selectedHero.name}} details!</h2> <div>id: {{selectedHero.id}}</div> <div> <label> name: <input [(ngModel)]="selectedHero.name" placeholder="name"/> </label> </div> </div> import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Hero, HEROES } from './hero'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Authors Style Guide Sample'; heroes = HEROES; selectedHero!: Hero; onSelect(hero: Hero): void { this.selectedHero = hero; } } .heroes { margin: 0 0 2em 0; list-style-type: none; padding: 0; width: 15em; } <div id="search-component"> <label for="search-box">Hero Search</label> <input #searchBox id="search-box" (input)="search(searchBox.value)" /> <ul class="search-result"> <li *ngFor="let hero of heroes$ | async" > <a routerLink="/detail/{{hero.id}}"> {{hero.name}} </a> </li> </ul> </div>

<code-tabs> 上設定為 true 的 linenums 屬性顯式啟用所有窗格的編號。但是，第二個 <code-pane> 中設定為 false 的 linenums 屬性只會為自己禁用行號。

The linenums attribute set to true on <code-tabs> explicitly enables numbering for all panes. However, the linenums attribute set to false in the second <code-pane> disables line numbering only for itself.

<code-tabs linenums="true"> <code-pane header="app.component.html" path="docs-style-guide/src/app/app.component.html"> </code-pane> <code-pane header="app.component.ts" path="docs-style-guide/src/app/app.component.ts" linenums="false"> </code-pane> <code-pane header="app.component.css (heroes)" path="docs-style-guide/src/app/app.component.css" region="heroes"> </code-pane> <code-pane header="package.json (scripts)" path="docs-style-guide/package.1.json"> </code-pane> </code-tabs>

為程式碼片段準備原始碼link

Preparing source code for code snippetslink

要顯示 <code-example> 和 <code-tabs> 程式碼段，請將程式碼段標記新增到範例原始碼檔案。

To display <code-example> and <code-tabs> snippets, add code snippet markup to sample source code files.

本頁面的範例原始碼位於 content/examples/docs-style-guide 中，包含本節中描述的每個程式碼段標記的範例。

The sample source code for this page, located in content/examples/docs-style-guide, contains examples of every code snippet markup described in this section.

程式碼段標記始終採用註釋的形式。TypeScript 或 JavaScript 檔案的預設 #docregion 標記如下：

Code snippet markup is always in the form of a comment. The default #docregion markup for a TypeScript or JavaScript file is as follows:

// #docregion … some TypeScript or JavaScript code … // #enddocregion <!-- #docregion --> … some HTML … <!-- #enddocregion --> /* #docregion */ … some CSS … /* #enddocregion */

文件產生過程會先刪除這些註釋，然後在文件檢視器 StackBlitz 和範例程式碼下載中顯示它們。

The documentation generation process erases these comments before displaying them in the documentation viewer, StackBlitz, and sample code downloads.

由於 JSON 不允許註釋，因此程式碼段標記在 JSON 檔案中不起作用。有關更多資訊，參閱有關JSON 檔案的部分。

Because JSON does not allow comments, code snippet markup doesn't work in JSON files. See the section on JSON files for more information.

#docregionlink

在原始檔中使用 #docregion 來標記要在 <code-example> 或 <code-tabs> 元件中使用的程式碼。

Use #docregion in source files to mark code for use in <code-example> or <code-tabs> components.

#docregion 註釋開始一個程式碼片段區域。該註釋之後的每一行程式碼都屬於該區域，直到程式碼片段處理器遇到檔案結尾或關閉 #enddocregion。

The #docregion comment begins a code snippet region. Every line of code after that comment belongs in the region until the code fragment processor encounters the end of the file or a closing #enddocregion.

以下 src/main.ts 是檔案頂部帶有單個 #docregion 的檔案範例。

The following src/main.ts is an example of a file with a single #docregion at the top of the file.

import { platformBrowserDynamic } from '@angular/platform-browser-dynamic'; import { AppModule } from './app/app.module'; platformBrowserDynamic().bootstrapModule(AppModule) .catch(err => console.error(err));

因此，整個檔案都在 <code-example> 中。

As a result, the entire file is in the <code-example>.

命名 #docregionlink

Naming a #docregionlink

要顯示同一個檔案中來自不同片段的多個片段，請為每個片段指定其自己的 #docregion 名稱，如下所示，其中 your-region-name 是一個帶有連字元的小寫字串：

To display multiple snippets from different fragments within the same file, give each fragment its own #docregion name as follows, where your-region-name is a hyphenated lowercase string:

// #docregion your-region-name … some code … // #enddocregion your-region-name

在 <code-example> 或 <code-pane> 的 region 屬性中按名稱參考此區域，如下所示：

Reference this region by name in the region attribute of the <code-example> or <code-pane> as follows:

<code-example path="your-example-app/src/app/your-file.ts" region="your-region-name"></code-example>

因為沒有名稱的 #docregion 是預設區域，所以你在參考預設 #docregion 時無需設定 region 屬性。

Because the #docregion with no name is the default region, you do not need to set the region attribute when referring to the default #docregion.

巢狀(Nesting) #docregionlink

Nesting a #docregionlink

將 #docregion 放在另一個 #docregion 中，如以下範例所示，具有巢狀(Nesting)的 inner-region：

Place a #docregion within another #docregion as in the following example with a nested inner-region:

// #docregion … some code … // #docregion inner-region … more code … // #enddocregion inner-region … yet more code … /// #enddocregion

組合程式碼片段link

Combining code fragmentslink

透過定義具有相同區域名稱的多個 #docregion 部分，將同一個檔案中的多個片段合併到一個程式碼段中。以下範例定義了兩個巢狀(Nesting)的 #docregion 部分。

Combine several fragments from the same file into a single code snippet by defining multiple #docregion sections with the same region name. The following example defines two nested #docregion sections.

內部區域 class-skeleton 出現兩次——一次是為了捕獲開啟類定義的程式碼，第二次是為了捕獲關閉類定義的程式碼。

The inner region, class-skeleton, appears twice —once to capture the code that opens the class definition and a second time to capture the code that closes the class definition.

// #docplaster … // #docregion class, class-skeleton export class AppComponent { // #enddocregion class-skeleton title = 'Authors Style Guide Sample'; heroes = HEROES; selectedHero: Hero; onSelect(hero: Hero): void { this.selectedHero = hero; } // #docregion class-skeleton } // #enddocregion class, class-skeleton

#docplaster 標記告訴處理器要使用什麼文字字串（即“plaster”）將每個片段連線為單個片段。將“石膏”文字放在同一行。比如，#docplaster --- 將使用 --- 作為“plaster”文字。對於前一個檔案，“plaster”文字是空的，因此每個片段之間將沒有任何內容。

The #docplaster marker tells the processor what text string to use —that is, the "plaster"— to join each of the fragments into a single snippet. Place the "plaster" text on the same line. For example, #docplaster --- would use --- as the "plaster" text. In the case of the previous file, the "plaster" text is empty so there will be nothing in between each fragment.

如果沒有 #docplaster，處理器會在片段之間插入預設的 plaster（省略號註釋）。

Without #docplaster, the processor inserts the default plaster —an ellipsis comment— between the fragments.

這是兩個對應的程式碼片段，用於並排比較。

Here are the two corresponding code snippets for side-by-side comparison.

export class AppComponent { title = 'Authors Style Guide Sample'; heroes = HEROES; selectedHero!: Hero; onSelect(hero: Hero): void { this.selectedHero = hero; } } export class AppComponent { }

上面的範例還示範了一個 #docregion 或 #enddocregion 註釋可以指定兩個區域名稱，這是一種在同一程式碼行上啟動或停止多個區域的便捷方式。或者，你可以將這些註釋放在單獨的行中，如下例所示：

The above example also demonstrates that one #docregion or #enddocregion comment can specify two region names, which is a convenient way to start or stop multiple regions on the same code line. Alternatively, you could put these comments on separate lines as in the following example:

// #docplaster … // #docregion class // #docregion class-skeleton export class AppComponent { // #enddocregion class-skeleton title = 'Authors Style Guide Sample'; heroes = HEROES; selectedHero: Hero; onSelect(hero: Hero): void { this.selectedHero = hero; } // #docregion class-skeleton } // #enddocregion class // #enddocregion class-skeleton

JSON 檔案link

JSON fileslink

<code-example> 元件無法顯示 JSON 檔案的某些部分，因為 JSON 禁止註釋。但是，你可以透過在 <code-example> src 屬性中參考整個 JSON 檔案來顯示它。

The <code-example> component cannot display portions of a JSON file because JSON forbids comments. However, you can display an entire JSON file by referencing it in the <code-example> src attribute.

對於大型 JSON 檔案，你可以將感興趣的節點複製到 Markdown 反引號中，但由於這種方式很容易錯誤地建立無效的 JSON，請考慮使用要顯示的片段建立 JSON 部分檔案。

For large JSON files, you could copy the nodes-of-interest into Markdown backticks, but as it's easy to mistakenly create invalid JSON that way, consider creating a JSON partial file with the fragment you want to display.

你不能測試部分檔案，也不能在應用程式中使用它，但至少你的編輯器可以確認它在語法上是正確的。你還可以將部分檔案儲存在原始檔案旁邊，因此作者更有可能記住使兩者保持同步。

You can't test a partial file nor use it in the application, but at least your editor can confirm that it is syntactically correct. You can also store the partial file next to the original, so it is more likely that the author will remember to keep the two in sync.

這是一個範例，它將 package.json 中的某些指令碼摘錄到名為 package.json 的部分檔案中 package.1.json

Here's an example that excerpts certain scripts from package.json into a partial file named package.1.json.

{ "scripts": { "start": "concurrently \"npm run build:watch\" \"npm run serve\"", "test": "concurrently \"npm run build:watch\" \"karma start karma.conf.js\"", "lint": "tslint ./src/**/*.ts -t verbose" } } <code-example header="package.json (selected scripts)" path="docs-style-guide/package.1.json"></code-example>

在某些情況下，最好使用完整檔名，而不是部分檔名。在這種情況下，完整檔案是 package.json，部分檔案是 package.1.json。由於重點通常在完整檔案上，而不是部分檔案上，因此使用閱讀器編輯的檔名，在此範例中是 package.json，可以闡明要在哪個檔案中工作。

In some cases, it is preferable to use the name of the full file rather than the partial. In this case, the full file is package.json and the partial file is package.1.json. Since the focus is generally on the full file rather than the partial, using the name of the file the reader edits, in this example package.json, clarifies which file to work in.

部分檔案命名link

Partial file naminglink

指南的分步性質需要重構，這意味著有些程式碼片段是透過指南演變的。

The step-by-step nature of the guides necessitate refactoring, which means there are code snippets that evolve through a guide.

使用部分檔案來示範最終原始碼的中間版本以及不會出現在最終應用程式中的程式碼片段。範例命名約定在副檔名之前新增一個數字，如下所示：

Use partial files to demonstrate intermediate versions of the final source code with fragments of code that don't appear in the final app. The sample naming convention adds a number before the file extension, as follows:

package.1.json app.component.1.ts app.component.2.ts

請記住透過在 stackblitz.json 中列出這些檔案來從 StackBlitz 中排除它們，如下所示：

Source code stylinglink

原始碼應儘可能遵循Angular 的風格指南。

Source code should follow Angular's style guide where possible.

Hexadecimalslink

十六進位制應儘可能使用速記，並且僅使用小寫字母。

Live exampleslink

Adding <live-example></live-example> to a page generates two default links: .

錨link

Anchorslink

每個節標題也是一個錨點。另一個指南頁面可以新增到此“Anchors”部分的連結，其內容如下：

Every section header is also an anchor point. Another guide page could add a link to this "Anchors" section with the following:

<div class="alert is-helpful"> See the ["Anchors"](guide/docs-style-guide#anchors "Style Guide —Anchors") section for details. </div>

瀏覽器會渲染以下內容：

The browser renders the following:

有關詳細資訊，參閱“錨”部分。

See the "Anchors" section for details.

請注意，上面的範例包含一個標題“Style Guide —Anchors”。使用錨點上的標題來建立工具提示並改進 UX。

Notice that the above example includes a title of "Style Guide —Anchors". Use titles on anchors to create tooltips and improve UX.

在頁面中導航時，你可以在指定向上滾動到本節開頭的連結時省略頁面 URL，如下所示：

When navigating within a page, you can omit the page URL when specifying the link that scrolls up to the beginning of this section, as in the following:

… the link that [scrolls up](#anchors "Anchors") to …

節標題錨點link

Section header anchorslink

雖然文件產生器會根據標頭的措辭自動為標頭建立錨點，但標題是可以更改的，這可能會中斷到該部分的任何連結。

While the documentation generator automatically creates anchors for headers based on the header wording, titles can change, which can potentially break any links to that section.

為了減輕連結破損，請使用特殊的 <a id="name"></a> 語法在其適用的標題或文字的正上方顯式新增自訂錨點：

To mitigate link breakage, add a custom anchor explicitly, just above the heading or text to which it applies, using the special <a id="name"></a> syntax as follows:

#### Section header anchors

然後像這樣參考該錨：

Then reference that anchor like this:

This is a [link to that custom anchor name](#section-anchors).

瀏覽器會渲染以下內容：

The browser renders the following:

這是到該自訂錨點名稱的連結。

This is a link to that custom anchor name.

編輯檔案時，請不要刪除任何錨點。如果更改了文件結構，則可以在不中斷連結的情況下移動同一個文件中的現有錨點。你還可以新增使用更適當文字的更多錨點。

When editing a file, don't remove any anchors. If you change the document structure, you can move an existing anchor within that same document without breaking a link. You can also add more anchors with more appropriate text.

作為替代方案，你可以用 HTML <a> 標籤。使用 <a> 元素時，請設定 id 屬性——而不是 name 屬性，因為文件產生器不會將 name 轉換為正確的連結 URL。比如：

As an alternative, you can use the HTML <a> tag. When using the <a> element, set the id attribute —rather than the name attribute because the documentation generator does not convert the name to the proper link URL. For example:

<a id="anchors"></a> ## Anchors

警報和標註link

Alerts and calloutslink

警報和標註會顯示警告、額外的詳細資訊或對相關主題的參考。

Alerts and callouts present warnings, extra detail, or references to related topics.

警報或標註不應包含任何對於瞭解主要內容所必需的內容。操作指南或課程步驟應該在指南的主體而不是小節中。

An alert or callout should not contain anything essential to understanding the main content. Instructions or tutorial steps should be in the main body of a guide rather than in a subsection.

警報link

Alertslink

警報會引起人們對簡短而重要的點的注意。對於多行內容，參閱標註。

Alerts draw attention to short, important points. For multi-line content, see callouts.

有關更多資訊，參閱即時範例部分。

See the live examples section for more information.

注意：
開始和結束 <div> 標籤後必須至少有一個空行。關閉 </div> 之前的空行是常規的，但不是必需的。

NOTE:
At least one blank line must follow both the opening and closing <div> tags. A blank line before the closing </div> is conventional but not required.

<div class="alert is-helpful"> See the [live examples](guide/docs-style-guide#live-examples "Live examples") section for more information. </div>

根據內容的重要性，可以將警報的樣式分為三個不同的級別。

There are three different levels for styling the alerts according to the importance of the content.

使用以下 alert 類以及適當 is-helpful 、 is-important 或 is-critical CSS 類，如下所示：

Use the following the alert class along with the appropriate is-helpful, is-important, or is-critical CSS class, as follows:

<div class="alert is-helpful"> A helpful, informational alert. </div> <div class="alert is-important"> An important alert. </div> <div class="alert is-critical"> A critical alert. </div>

瀏覽器會渲染以下內容：

The browser renders the following:

一個有用的資訊警報。

A helpful, informational alert.

一個重要的警報。

An important alert.

嚴重警報。

A critical alert.

標註link

Calloutslink

標註（比如警報）會突出顯示要點。當你需要標頭和多行內容時，使用標註。

Callouts, like alerts, highlight important points. Use a callout when you need a header and multi-line content.

如果你有兩個以上的段落，請考慮建立一個新頁面或將其作為主要內容的一部分。

If you have more than two paragraphs, consider creating a new page or making it part of the main content.

標註使用與警報相同的樣式級別。

Callouts use the same styling levels as alerts.

將 CSS 類 callout 與適當 is-helpful 、 is-important 或 is-critical 類結合使用。以下範例使用 is-helpful 類：

Use the CSS class callout in conjunction with the appropriate is-helpful, is-important, or is-critical class. The following example uses the is-helpful class:

<div class="callout is-helpful"> <header>A helpful or informational point</header> **A helpful note**. Use a helpful callout for information requiring explanation. Callouts are typically multi-line notes. They can also contain code snippets. </div>

瀏覽器會渲染這三種樣式，如下所示：

The browser renders the three styles as follows:

有用的或資訊性的點
A helpful or informational point

一個有用的說明。對需要解釋的資訊使用有用的標註。標註通常是多行註釋。它們還可以包含程式碼片段。

A helpful note. Use a helpful callout for information requiring explanation. Callouts are typically multi-line notes. They can also contain code snippets.

一個重要的點
An important point

一個重要說明。對需要解釋的重要資訊使用重要標註。標註通常是多行註釋。它們還可以包含程式碼片段。

An important note. Use an important callout for significant information requiring explanation. Callouts are typically multi-line notes. They can also contain code snippets.

一個臨界點
A critical point

一個批判性的說明。對需要解釋的令人信服的資訊使用關鍵標註。標註通常是多行註釋。它們還可以包含程式碼片段。

A critical note. Use a critical callout for compelling information requiring explanation. Callouts are typically multi-line notes. They can also contain code snippets.

使用標註時，請考慮以下幾點：

When using callouts, consider the following points:

  • 標註標題文字樣式是大寫

    The callout header text style is uppercase

  • 標頭不會在目錄中渲染

    The header does not render in the table of contents

  • 你可以在 Markdown 中編寫標註正文

    You can write the callout body in Markdown

  • 空行將 <header> 標籤與 Markdown 內容分開

    A blank line separates the <header> tag from the Markdown content

  • 避免使用 <h2> 、 <h3> 、 <h4> 、 <h5> 或 <h6>，因為標註的 CSS 是 <header> 元素的樣式

    Avoid using an <h2>, <h3>, <h4>, <h5>, or <h6>, as the CSS for callouts styles the <header> element

謹慎使用標註來吸參考戶的注意力。

Use callouts sparingly to grab the user's attention.

樹木link

Treeslink

使用樹來表示分層資料，比如目錄結構。

Use trees to represent hierarchical data such as directory structure.

sample-dir
src
app
app.component.ts
app.module.ts
styles.css
tsconfig.json
node_modules …
package.json

這是此檔案樹的標記。

Here is the markup for this file tree.

<div class="filetree"> <div class="file"> sample-dir </div> <div class="children"> <div class="file"> src </div> <div class="children"> <div class="file"> app </div> <div class="children"> <div class="file"> app.component.ts </div> <div class="file"> app.module.ts </div> </div> <div class="file"> styles.css </div> <div class="file"> tsconfig.json </div> </div> <div class="file"> node_modules … </div> <div class="file"> package.json </div> </div> </div>

鏡像link

Imageslink

將圖像儲存在 content/images/guide 目錄中與指南頁面同名的資料夾中。因為 Angular 文件的產生會將這些鏡像複製到 generated/images/guide/your-guide-directory，因此將鏡像 src 屬性設定為 Generated generated/images/guide/your-guide-directory 的執行時位置。

Store images in the content/images/guide directory in a folder with the same name as the guide page. Because Angular documentation generation copies these images to generated/images/guide/your-guide-directory, set the image src attribute to the runtime location of generated/images/guide/your-guide-directory.

比如，本“Angular 文件風格指南”的圖像在 content/images/guide/docs-style-guide 資料夾中，但 src 屬性指定了 generated 的位置。

For example, images for this "Angular documentation style guide" are in the content/images/guide/docs-style-guide folder, but the src attribute specifies the generated location.

以下是屬於本指南的“flying hero”圖像的 src 屬性：

The following is the src attribute for the "flying hero" image belonging to this guide:

src="generated/images/guide/docs-style-guide/flying-hero.png"
使用 HTML<img>標籤
Use the HTML <img> tag

使用 <img> 標籤指定圖像。不要使用 Markdown 圖像語法 ![... ](... )。

Specify images using the <img> tag. Do not use the Markdown image syntax, ![... ](... ).

對於無障礙性，請始終使用對圖像進行有意義的描述來設定 alt 屬性。

For accessibility, always set the alt attribute with a meaningful description of the image.

將 <img> 標籤巢狀(Nesting)在 <div class="lightbox"> 標籤中，該標籤會根據文件標準來設定圖像的樣式。

Nest the <img> tag within a <div class="lightbox"> tag, which styles the image according to the documentation standard.

<div class="lightbox"> <img alt="flying hero" src="generated/images/guide/docs-style-guide/flying-hero.png"> </div>

注意：
HTML <img> 元素沒有關閉標籤。

NOTE:
The HTML <img> element does not have a closing tag.

瀏覽器會渲染以下內容：

The browser renders the following:

圖片說明和圖形說明link

Image captions and figure captionslink

標題顯示在圖像下方，作為圖像的簡明而全面的摘要。除非你使用編號的圖形，比如圖 1、圖 2 等，否則標題是可選的。如果你在頁面中使用編號的圖形，請按照 Google 開發者文件風格指南中的圖形標題中的指南進行操作。

A caption appears underneath the image as a concise and comprehensive summary of the image. Captions are optional unless you are using numbered figures, such as Figure 1, Figure 2, and so on. If you are using numbered figures in a page, follow the guidelines in Figure captions in the Google Developer Documentation Style Guide.

圖像尺寸link

Image dimensionslink

文件產生器從圖像檔案中讀取圖像尺寸，並自動將 width 和 height 屬性新增到 <img> 標籤。

The doc generator reads the image dimensions from an image file and adds width and height attributes to the <img> tag automatically.

要控制圖像的大小，請提供你自己的 width 和 height 屬性。

To control the size of the image, supply your own width and height attributes.

這是寬度為 200px 的“飛行英雄”標記：

Here's the "flying hero" markup with a 200px width:

<div class="lightbox"> <img alt="flying Angular hero" src="generated/images/guide/docs-style-guide/flying-hero.png" width="200"> </div>

瀏覽器會渲染以下內容：

The browser renders the following:

寬幅圖像link

Wide imageslink

為防止圖像溢位其畫面，請使用低於 700px 的圖像寬度。要顯示更大的圖像，請提供指向實際圖像的連結，使用者可以單擊該連結以單獨檢視完整大小的圖像，比如“Ahead-of-time Compilation”指南中的 source-map-explorer 輸出的範例：

To prevent images overflowing their viewports, use image widths under 700px. To display a larger image, provide a link to the actual image that the user can click to see the full size image separately, as in this example of source-map-explorer output from the "Ahead-of-time Compilation" guide:

以下是用於建立圖像連結的 HTML：

The following is the HTML for creating a link to the image:

<a href="generated/images/guide/docs-style-guide/toh-pt6-bundle.png" title="Click to view larger image"> <div class="lightbox"> <img alt="toh-pt6-bundle" src="generated/images/guide/docs-style-guide/toh-pt6-bundle-700w.png" width="300px"> </div> </a>

圖像壓縮link

Image compressionlink

為了更快的載入時間，請始終壓縮圖像。考慮使用圖像壓縮網站，比如tinypng。

For faster load times, always compress images. Consider using an image compression web site such as tinypng.

浮動畫像link

Floated imageslink

你可以透過分別應用 class="left" 或 class="right" 屬性來將圖像浮動到文字的左側或右側。比如：

You can float the image to the left or right of text by applying the class="left" or class="right" attributes respectively. For example:

<img alt="flying Angular hero" class="left" src="generated/images/guide/docs-style-guide/flying-hero.png" width="200"> This text wraps around to the right of the floating "flying hero" image. Headings and code-examples automatically clear a floated image. If you need to force a piece of text to clear a floating image, add `<br class="clear">` where the text should break. <br class="clear">

瀏覽器會渲染以下內容：

The browser renders the following:

此文字會在浮動的“飛行英雄”圖像的右側環繞。

This text wraps around to the right of the floating "flying hero" image.

標題和 <code-example> 元件會自動清除浮動畫像。要顯式清除浮動畫像，請在文字應該中斷的位置新增 <br class="clear">。

Headings and <code-example> components automatically clear a floated image. To explicitly clear a floated image, add <br class="clear"> where the text should break.


一般來說，你不會將浮動畫像包裝在 <figure> 元素中。

Generally, you don't wrap a floated image in a <figure> element.

在小節內浮動link

Floats within a subsectionlink

如果你在警報、標註或小節中有浮動畫像，請將 clear-fix 類應用於 <div>，以確保圖像不會溢位其容器。比如：

If you have a floated image inside an alert, callout, or a subsection, apply the clear-fix class to the <div> to ensure that the image doesn't overflow its container. For example:

<div class="alert is-helpful clear-fix"> <img alt="flying Angular hero" src="generated/images/guide/docs-style-guide/flying-hero.png" class="right" width="100"> A subsection with **Markdown** formatted text. </div>

瀏覽器會渲染以下內容：

The browser renders the following:

帶有Markdown格式文字的小節。

A subsection with Markdown formatted text.
